Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What is it? Has anything gotten through?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Nothing out of the ordinary, sir.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Luckily, my surveillance system is still functional.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Ha! I wouldn't have thrown you out if it didn't work, you know?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: "Didn't those humans throw us out for that exact reason...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Ha! Probably have internalized that rationale is what it is. Gotta make myself useful somehow.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're nothing like them. We never abandon one of our own.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So far, the only human I've met that feels this way...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'There will be more. It has to be.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Seeing that you're here without a platoon behind you, I'll trust you this one time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmph. That said, it wouldn't be the first time I trust you, would it?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I've never done you dirty.", 3: '23', 4: 'Gray Raven is very reliable, you know.', 5: '23'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sure, sure... Come on, let's go to the next location.", 4: '1'}
